options = {'mag_file': 'fake'}
program_ran, error_message = convert.iodp_jr6(**options)
expected_msg = (
    """The input file you provided: {} does not exist.
Make sure you have specified the correct filename AND correct input directory name."""
    .format(os.path.realpath(os.path.join('.', 'fake'))))
self.assertFalse(program_ran)
self.assertEqual(error_message, expected_msg)
